articles.title: New asteroid named 'T4660 Nereus', size of Eiffel Tower, heading for Earth in December - Asianet News English
articles.description: According to NASA, it will only pass close to Earth on December 11, despite being 'egg-shaped' and about three times the size of a football field.
articles.content: According to NASA, it will only pass close to Earth on December 11, despite being 'egg-shaped' and about three times the size of a football field. An asteroid the size of the Eiffel Tower is heading … [+1990 chars]

articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.title: Pfizer Covid Pill Hits Shares of Asian Covid Vaccine Makers - BNN
articles.description: Makers of Covid-19 vaccines and treatments slumped in Asia after Pfizer Inc. published a positive result from its Covid-19 pill, which it said reduced hospitalizations and deaths in high-risk patients by 89%.

articles.title: Kāpiti man prepares for his own death as euthanasia law begins - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Steve Smith could be one of the first New Zealanders to make use of a new law, allowing the terminally ill to end their own lives.
articles.content:
Steve Smith will have a last conversation with his wife then die at a preset time in her arms.
 "For me, it is a tiredness-of-life choice because of pain but also because I have no quality of life a… [+4027 chars]

articles.title: Man in Brazil dies after jumping into piranha-infested lake to escape swarm of bees - AsiaOne
